AccountId.description: The account of the client that's associated with the broker of record.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies are enabled, this field contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

EffectiveDate.description: The date when the broker of record becomes effective.

EndDate.description: The date when the broker of record ends.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LineOfBusiness.description: Specifies the type of business supported by the broker of record.

LineOfCoverage.description: Specifies the type of insurance coverage offered by the broker of record.

LostOpportunityId.description: The lost opportunity to identify the expected revenue loss.

Name.description: The name of the broker of record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

Status.description: The current status of the broker of record.

WonOpportunityId.description: The won opportunity that started the broker of record relationship.
